update roomsale set room_num = #{roomNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, days = #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_price = #{roomPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rent_price = #{rentPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, other_price = #{otherPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, discount_price = #{discountPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select from roomsale
and room_num like concat("%",#{roomNum},"%")
and start_date >= #{minDate} and start_date <= #{maxDate}
order by id desc
